OCD.name: Extract Co-Word Network from Table
OCD.description: Given a table, this algorithm creates a co-word occurrence network, where the strength of edges between papers represents the similarity of their abstracts

AD.name: Node Identifier Column
AD.description: The column whose contents identify each paper, for instance the title column

AD.name: Text Source Column
AD.description: The column identifying the text which is used to determine the similarity between papers

AD.name: Text Delimiter
AD.description: The character that separates each word in the Text Source Column

AD.name: Aggregate Function File
AD.description: The name of a file that contains functions to perform on the data.
